title: 6th sem electives
content:
I want to increase my cgpa 
Which electives are easier to score that wld help me do so
Seniors Please help !!

comments.body: After seeing the results of 5th sem i don't think it matter at all.
List your electives. Its easier for people to suggest.

Elective 3- NLP, BlockChain, Digital twin, GenAI, Algo for info retrieval 
Elective 4- DL, Robotics, HP, IS, DBT

Among E3, I remember Blockchain and AIR being easy with AIR being the easiest elective across 3rd year for my batch. Among E4, DBT is a mostly straightforward (and useful) course. Unless the syllabus has vastly changed, the first part of the course will cover most topics from DBMS.
Iâ€™d second this, I had taken AIR and DBT, both were pretty chill with easy assignments and projects
